Society

  • Come in, come in, you see me? Why are the Len regionsy's cellphones asleep at night?

    The experts explained the braking of the mobile Internet. The malfunction covered the Smartphones from the Selection to the Pskovs. There's a version of power and instantaneous.

    26.01.2024
  • Now the Leningrads can speak about the improvement of the bean.

    The official chat-bot has begun its work, which accepts ideas, criticism and gratitude for the improvement in the Leningrad region. You can also write a local legend.

    26.01.2024
  • The United Nations International Court of Justice has committed Israel to take measures to prevent genocide in the Gaza Strip

    The United Nations Court considers that Israel must take all necessary measures to prevent all acts falling under the Genocide Convention.

    26.01.2024
  • Len regions are facing the night off of the Internet, followed by pskovs and new gardens.

    The third region in North-West Russia has warned of a possible communication problem.

    26.01.2024
  • The Rossian will have several ways of prohibiting the opening of credit in his name.

    The draft law on self-default on second-reading credits in Gosdum broadened the list of places where such an option could be applied. This could give up the law for a year, and not everyone likes it.

    26.01.2024
  • From the spleen to the bed. How to listen to power today and give birth

    The birth drives you to be pregnant sooner. 47news polished the amount of money for that and where to take it. Unless, of course, make babies without delay.

    26.01.2024
  • Electrics and a bus to the airport. The new scheme will appear in the peterburg subway.

    The Pheterburg Metropolitan is preparing to house a new scheme. No, the underground stations were no longer there, they just drew ground transportation.

    26.01.2024
  • It's expensive. Murino and comfort are going to Lavuriki Park.

    The new road will replace concrete stoves and ponds of sand in Murino of the All-Vovolo region of Leningrad. Especially for someone who's going to live in still-built houses at Lavriki Park.

    26.01.2024
  • Putin demanded that payments be made to the families of the deceased members of the special operations within three months.

    The President of the Russian Federation has instructed the families of deceased special forces to pay up to three months from the date of application. The Government needed to amend the law.

    26.01.2024
  • In Len regionali at night before -15, day by day - 7, synoptics told me what the weather would be for tomorrow.

    In the region, cloud weather is expected to prevail on 27 January. It's a little snow. There's a holodeck on the roads. Air temperature at night - 4... - 9, places - 12... 15, day 2... - 7.

    26.01.2024
  • We'll take a baby stick. In the Choice of Child Camp Coach, criminal proceedings were initiated

    The Kikboxing coach is suspected of having committed an 11-year-old at the children ' s camp of the Lenoblasty District. Bastrykin has commissioned a case, investigators search the details, question other children from the section and their parents.

    26.01.2024
  • Awesome and smile: Gendierator Pulkovo criticized the Sheikhs in Russian airports.

    The procedure for looking at tourists from the Middle East at Russian airports needs to be changed. If we want to attract them here, we need to introduce a different level of service, politely, with a smile, to meet guests, proposed by CEO Pulkovo.

    26.01.2024
  • Soomi's mail and food industry, too, decided to strike, not work.

    Two other branches of the Finnish economy reported a two-day pause.

    26.01.2024
  • Nestle's daughter warned about raising animal feed prices.

    The dry and wet animal feed, which is produced by the Russian unit of the Swiss company Nestle, has increased from February to 12%. Which trademarks might affect the BCF.

    26.01.2024
  • Skills: identified as one of the main trends over the coming years in the regional labour market

    Immediately 74 per cent of the workers surveyed in Leningrad oblast expect continuing education to be the most important trend in the labour market over the next seven years.

    26.01.2024
  • Bugrah is preparing to fight rats. Domestic animal owners are asked to be careful.

    There's a paw out there. There's a version that small predators probably attracted delicious food for the ducks, but now they're gonna fight the poor guests.

    26.01.2024
  • The auction of trust. The fraudsters started catching the roses at the foreign stores.

    In Russia, a new fraudulent scheme has been introduced with counterfeit auctions for the sale of used inomalies. People are attracted to the alleged bidding where the car can be purchased.

    26.01.2024
  • How to combine study and work. Student councils

    In Russia today, 666,000 young professionals are looking for work, many of whom are nomad students. How do you combine work and study?

    25.01.2024
  • Dead food. Oncologist called products that promote stomach cancer.

    The most dangerous digest, red meat, canned salt products, alcoholic beverages, vegetables and high harmful toxins.

    25.01.2024
  • Dreams aren't bad. Russian students spoke of the desired monthly income

    In a year, the wages of Russian students increased by 25 per cent. Last year, the desired monthly income of respondents was 80,700 roubles, of which 100,000.

    25.01.2024

47news.ru is an independent Internet publication aimed at providing comprehensive coverage of political and public life in the Leningrad region, economic and investment activities in the region. The sponsors expect that " 47 news " will be a popular and constructive platform for free discussion of developments in the 47th region of Russia.
